content.buttonTooltip: Layers are listed based on their source dataset's role in the Ortho Mapping workspace.
Layers are listed by drawing order. Drag and drop to change drawing order.
Layers are listed by their data source.
Layers are listed by whether their features are selectable by the interactive selection and editing tools.
Layers are listed by their edit snapping status.
Layers are listed by their label class.
Layers are listed and prioritized based on the ability to display them in image space.

button.caption: Add System Style
button.tooltip: Add one or more system styles provided with the software to the project.

button.caption: Add Style
button.tooltip: Navigate to an existing style and add it to the project.

button.caption: New Style
button.tooltip: Create a new, empty style and add it to the project.

button.caption: New Mobile Style
button.tooltip: Create a new, empty mobile style and add it to the project.

button.caption: Import
button.tooltip: Import an existing .style file(s) to create a .stylx file(s) and add it to the project.

button.caption: Import
button.extendedCaption: Import existing style file to project
button.tooltip: Import an existing .style file(s) to create a .stylx file(s) and add it to the project.

button.caption: Add Style
button.tooltip: Add the selected style(s) to the project.

button.caption: Add Style
button.extendedCaption: Add style to project on project pane context menu
button.tooltip: Add the selected style(s) to the project.

button.caption: Save to Style
button.extendedCaption: Save style item to editable style
button.tooltip: Save a copy of the currently selected style class item to any editable project style.

button.caption: Add to Favorites
button.tooltip: Save a copy of the currently selected style class item directly into the Favorites style.

button.caption: Copy
button.tooltip: Copy the selected style class item(s) to the clipboard.

button.caption: Delete
button.tooltip: Delete the selected style class item(s).

button.caption: Paste
button.extendedCaption: Paste selected style item to current style
button.tooltip: Paste style class items from the clipboard into the current style.

button.caption: Cut
button.extendedCaption: Cut selected style item to clipboard
button.tooltip: Cut the selected style class item(s) to the clipboard.

button.caption: Remove
button.tooltip: Disconnect this style from the project. The style is not deleted.

button.caption: Manage
button.tooltip: Open the style to view or modify its style items.

button.caption: Sync
button.tooltip: Open the style to view or modify its style items.

button.caption: Upgrade
button.tooltip: Upgrade style to current version

comboBox.caption: Show:
comboBox.tooltip: Choose which style class to view.

button.caption: New
button.extendedCaption: Add new style item to current style
button.tooltip: Add a new style item of the current style class into the current style.

button.caption: Point Symbol
button.tooltip: Add a new point symbol to the current style.

button.caption: Line Symbol
button.tooltip: Add a new line symbol to the current style.

button.caption: Polygon Symbol
button.extendedCaption: Add new polygon symbol to current style
button.tooltip: Add a new polygon symbol to the current style.

button.caption: Mesh Symbol
button.extendedCaption: Add new mesh symbol to current style
button.tooltip: Add a new mesh symbol to the current style.

button.caption: Text Symbol
button.extendedCaption: Add new text symbol to current style
button.tooltip: Add new text symbol to the current style.

button.caption: Color
button.tooltip: Add a new color to the current style.

button.caption: Color Scheme
button.tooltip: Add a new color scheme to the current style.

button.caption: Standard Label Placement
button.tooltip: Add a new label placement to the current style.

button.caption: Maplex Label Placement
button.tooltip: Add a new Maplex label placement to the current style.

button.caption: Icon
button.tooltip: View the style class items in a gridded gallery.

button.caption: List
button.extendedCaption: View style items in current style
button.tooltip: View the style class items in a list to see long names.

button.caption: By ID
button.tooltip: Sort the style class items by their inherent order.

button.caption: By Category
button.tooltip: Sort the style class items by their inherent order.

button.caption: By Name
button.tooltip: Sort the style class items alphabetically by name.

button.caption: Drawing Order
button.tooltip: Show layers in the table of contents by drawing order.

button.caption: Data Source
button.tooltip: Show layers in the table of contents by data source.

button.caption: Selection
button.tooltip: Show layers in the table of contents by whether they're selectable.

button.caption: Snapping
button.tooltip: Show layers in the table of contents by whether they're snappable.

button.caption: Labeling
button.tooltip: Show layers in the table of contents by label class.

button.caption: Ortho Mapping
button.tooltip: Show layers in the table of contents by...

button.caption: Perspective Imagery
button.tooltip: Show layers in table of contents prioritized based on the ability to display them in image space.

button.caption: Paste
button.tooltip: Paste the copied layers into the map.

button.caption: Paste
button.extendedCaption: Paste layers into group layer in map
button.tooltip: Paste the copied layers into a group layer.A single group layer must be selected.

button.caption: Copy
button.tooltip: Copy the selected layers to the clipboard.

button.caption: Copy
button.tooltip: Copy the selected elevation surfaces to the clipboard.

button.caption: Copy
button.tooltip: Copy the selected elevation sources to the clipboard.

button.caption: Paste
button.extendedCaption: Paste elevation sources into surface in map
button.tooltip: Paste the copied elevation sources into an elevation surface.An elevation surface must be selected.

button.caption: Settings
button.tooltip: GIS Project Settings.

button.caption: Project
button.tooltip: Show the Project pane.

button.caption: Import
button.tooltip:
Import an existing ArcMap, ArcGlobe, or ArcScene document, a map or basemap package, or a map file to the project.
The original data frames and layout are converted to the ArcGIS Pro format, if appropriate, and added to the project. Future changes to the original document are not reflected in the project. One of the new maps or the layout is opened in a view.

button.caption: Import Map
button.tooltip: Import an existing ArcMap, ArcGlobe, or ArcScene document, a map or basemap package, or a map or layout file to the project. The original data frames and layout are converted to the ArcGIS Pro format, if appropriate, and added to the project. Future changes to the original document are not reflected in the project. One of the new maps or layouts is opened in a view.

button.caption: New Map
button.tooltip: Create a new map for displaying data in two dimensions. The new map is saved within the project.

button.caption: New Global Scene
button.tooltip: Create a new global scene for displaying three dimensional data. A new global scene is saved within the project.

button.caption: New Local Scene
button.tooltip: Create a new local scene for displaying three dimensional data. A new local scene is saved within the project.

button.caption: New Stereo Map
button.tooltip: Create a new stereo map for stereo vision using an image pair taken from two different vantage points. The new stereo map is saved within the project. Available with Image Analyst license. Please refer documentation for details.

button.caption: New Basemap
button.tooltip: Create a new basemap. The new basemap is saved within the project.

button.caption: From File
button.tooltip: Add spatial data files to the project.

button.caption: Add Web Map
button.tooltip: Opens a new map from a .WebMap file. For internal testing only.

button.caption: GIS Server
button.tooltip: Add a GIS Server connection to the project.

button.caption: Add Data
button.tooltip: Add data to the map.

button.caption: Add From Geodatabase
button.tooltip: Add data from a geodatabase to a map.

button.caption: Add From File
button.tooltip: Add data from a spatial data file to a map.

button.caption: Add From Service
button.tooltip: Add data from a GIS service to a map.

button.caption: Add From Coverage
button.tooltip: Add data from a composite file-based dataset to a map.

button.caption: Add From XY Coordinate Data
button.tooltip: Add data from a file containing x,y coordinates to a map.

button.caption: Add From Query Layer
button.tooltip: Add data from a SQL query layer to a map.

button.caption: Open
button.tooltip: View a containment map.

button.caption: Open
button.tooltip: View a network diagram.

button.caption: Open
button.tooltip: View a map in 2D.

button.caption: Open Global View
button.tooltip: View a scene in a global view.

button.caption: Open Local View
button.tooltip: View a scene in a local view.

button.caption: Open
button.tooltip: View stereo map.

button.caption: To Global Scene
button.tooltip: Convert to a global scene.

button.caption: To Local Scene
button.tooltip: Convert to a local scene.

button.caption: To Map
button.tooltip: Convert to a 2D map.

button.caption: To Global Scene
button.tooltip: Convert to a global scene.

button.caption: To Local Scene
button.tooltip: Convert to a local scene.

button.caption: To Map
button.tooltip: Convert to a 2D map.

button.caption: Export To File...
button.tooltip: Export the map to a file on disk.

button.caption: To Map
button.tooltip: Convert to a 2D map.

button.caption: To Basemap
button.tooltip: Convert to a basemap.

button.caption: Delete
button.tooltip: Delete a project item.

button.caption: Properties
button.tooltip: Show properties for the map.

button.caption: Set Reference Scale
button.tooltip: Set a reference scale for the map to draw symbols and text at the desired size when the map is at the specified reference scale.

button.caption: Clear Reference Scale
button.tooltip: Clear the reference scale for the map.

button.caption: Create Thumbnail
button.tooltip: Generate thumbnail for the map.

button.caption: Import Thumbnail
button.tooltip: Import thumbnail for the map.

button.caption: Map
button.tooltip: View map in 2D.

button.caption: Global
button.tooltip: Change map to 3D global view.

button.caption: Local
button.tooltip: Change map to 3D local view.

button.caption: To Map
button.tooltip: Convert to a 2D map.

button.caption: To Global Scene
button.tooltip: Convert to a global scene.

button.caption: To Local Scene
button.tooltip: Convert to a local scene.

button.caption: To Basemap
button.tooltip: Convert to a basemap.

button.caption: Navigator
button.tooltip: Show or hide the navigator control.

button.caption: Copy Coordinates
button.tooltip: Copy the current coordinates to the clipboard.

button.caption: DD
button.tooltip: Convert the current coordinates to Decimal Degrees and copy to the clipboard.

button.caption: DDM
button.tooltip: Convert the current coordinates to Decimal Degrees Minutes and copy to the clipboard.

button.caption: DMS
button.tooltip: Convert the current coordinates to DMS and copy to the clipboard.

button.caption: MGRS
button.tooltip: Convert the current coordinates to MGRS and copy to the clipboard.

button.caption: USNG
button.tooltip: Convert the current coordinates to USNG and copy to the clipboard.

button.caption: UTM
button.tooltip: Convert the current coordinates to UTM and copy to the clipboard.

button.caption: Go To XY
button.tooltip: Show or hide the Go To XY control.

button.caption: Center And Scale
button.tooltip:
Link all views with the active view by centering on the same point and displaying at the same scale.
Rotation of the linked views dynamically changes to match the rotation of the active view.

button.caption: Center
button.tooltip: Link all views with the active view by centering on the same point. Scale does not change in the linked views.

button.caption: Time
button.tooltip: Link the time extent for all map views.

tool.caption: Explore
tool.tooltip:
1. View pop-ups and pan 2. Zoom, rotate / tilt (3D-only) 3. Zoom continuous
Quick shortcuts: Shift = zoom rectangle Ctrl = view pop-ups within rectangle N = point north B = look around (in 3D) C = explore when using another tool V = rotate / tilt

button.caption: Explore
button.tooltip:
1. View pop-ups and pan 2. Zoom, rotate / tilt (3D-only) 3. Zoom continuous
Quick shortcuts: Shift = zoom rectangle Ctrl = view pop-ups within rectangle N = point north B = look around (in 3D) C = explore when using another tool V = rotate / tilt

button.caption: Fixed Zoom Out
button.tooltip: Zoom out a fixed distance.

button.caption: Fixed Zoom In
button.tooltip: Zoom in a fixed distance.

button.caption: Zoom Full Extent
button.tooltip: Zoom to the full extent of the data in the view.

button.caption: Go To XY
button.tooltip: Navigate to specified x,y coordinates.

button.caption: Previous Extent
button.tooltip: Go to the previous extent.

button.caption: Next Extent
button.tooltip: Go to the next extent.

button.caption: Navigation Options
button.tooltip: Set navigation options.

button.caption: Zoom To Selection
button.tooltip: Zoom to the selected features of all layers.

button.caption: Pan To Selection
button.tooltip: Pan to the selected features of all layers.

tool.caption: Rectangle Zoom
tool.tooltip: Zoom the map by drawing a rectangle.No active map.

button.caption: Pause
button.tooltip: Suspend labeling in the current map. You can continue to work, but the labels are not redrawn.

button.caption: View Unplaced
button.tooltip: Draw the labels that could not be placed.

button.caption: Priorities...
button.tooltip: Display and set labeling priorities for the current map. Labels with a higher priority will generally be placed first.

button.caption: Weights...
button.tooltip: Display and set labeling weights for the current map. Label weights control how strongly features will act as barriers to label placement.

button.caption: Label Placement Properties
button.tooltip: Customize the placement of your labels using advanced options.

button.caption: More ...
button.tooltip: Choose the text symbol for the selected label classes.

button.caption: Text Symbol
button.tooltip: Customize the appearance of your labels using advanced options.

button.caption: Abbreviation Dictionaries...
button.tooltip: Create and edit abbreviation dictionaries. Abbreviation dictionaries are used to shorten long labels to fit within small spaces.Disabled if the current map is not labeled with Maplex.

button.caption: Key Numbering...
button.tooltip: Create and edit key numbering groups. Key numbering groups are used when labeling crowded areas. A table is provided showing the key numbers and the original labels.Disabled if the current map is not labeled with Maplex.

button.caption: Use Maplex Label Engine
button.tooltip: Switch between the Maplex Label Engine and the Standard Label Engine for the current map.

button.caption: Draft Quality
button.tooltip: Achieve better performance at the expense of labeling quality. This option is useful when initially setting up the labeling properties.Disabled if the current map is not labeled with Maplex.

button.caption: Convert To Annotation
button.tooltip: Convert labels to annotation. Annotation allows individual text graphics to be edited and stored in the geodatabase.Disabled if the current map is not labeled.

button.caption: Convert Labels To Annotation...
button.tooltip: Convert labels to annotation. Annotation allows individual text graphics to be edited and stored in the geodatabase.Disabled if the current map is not labeled.

dynamicMenu.caption: Add To Map
dynamicMenu.extendedCaption: Adds the selected items to the active map or to other open maps; on context menus

button.caption: Map
button.extendedCaption: Add the selected item to a new map; on context menu
button.tooltip: Add data to a new map.

button.caption: Add To Current Map
button.extendedCaption: Add the selected item to the active map; on context menu
button.tooltip: Add data to the active map.

button.caption: Global Scene
button.extendedCaption: Add the selected item to a new global scene; on context menu
button.tooltip: Add data to a new global scene.

button.caption: Local Scene
button.extendedCaption: Add the selected item to a new local scene; on context menu
button.tooltip: Add data to a new local scene.

button.caption: Add To Current Map
button.extendedCaption: Add the selected portal item to a the active map; on context menu
button.tooltip: Add data to the active map.

button.caption: Add To New Diagram Map
button.extendedCaption: Add the selected item to a new diagram map; on context menu
button.tooltip: Add data to a new diagram map.

button.caption: Label
button.tooltip: Enable labeling of the layer.

customControl.caption: Label Class
customControl.tooltip: Select the label class to view and edit its labeling properties.

checkBox.caption: Label Features In This Class
checkBox.tooltip: Label the features defined by the current label class.

button.caption: SQL Query
button.extendedCaption: Set SQL query for current label class
button.tooltip: Set the SQL Query for the current label class.

comboBox.caption: Expression
comboBox.extendedCaption: Set label expression choose from combobox
comboBox.tooltip: Set the label expression for the current label class.

button.caption: Expression
button.tooltip: Set the label expression for the current label class.

customControl.caption: Out Beyond
customControl.tooltip: Select the maximum zoom level at which the label class is visible. Zoom further from the map than this and the label class will be invisible.

customControl.caption: In Beyond
customControl.tooltip: Select the minimum zoom level at which the label class is visible. Zoom closer to the map than this and the label class will be invisible.

button.caption: Clear Limits
button.extendedCaption: Draw label class at all zoom levels
button.tooltip: Draw the label class at all zoom levels.

button.caption: Create Label Class...
button.tooltip: Create a new label class for the chosen layer.

button.caption: Create...
button.tooltip: Create a new label class for the chosen layer.

button.caption: Labeling Properties...
button.tooltip: Show labeling properties for selected label class.

button.caption: Remove Label Class
button.tooltip: Remove the label class shown in the Label Class drop-down menu.

button.caption: Remove
button.tooltip: Remove the selected label classes from the layer. All label classes cannot be removed. A layer needs at least one label class.

button.caption: Remove All But This
button.tooltip: Remove all label classes on the layer except for this label class.

button.caption: Rename Label Class...
button.tooltip: Rename the label class shown in the Label Class drop-down menu.

button.caption: Copy
button.tooltip: Copy the settings of the selected label class

button.caption: All Properties
button.tooltip: Paste the settings of the label class

button.caption: Placement Properties
button.extendedCaption: Paste the placement properties of the label class
button.tooltip: Paste the labeling properties of the label class

button.caption: Text Symbol Properties
button.extendedCaption: Paste the text symbol of the label class
button.tooltip: Paste the text symbol properties of the label class

button.caption: Expression
button.extendedCaption: Paste the expression of the label class
button.tooltip: Paste the expression of the label class

button.caption: SQL Query
button.extendedCaption: Paste the SQL query of the label class
button.tooltip: Paste the SQL query of the label class

button.caption: Visibility Range
button.extendedCaption: Paste the visibility range of the label class
button.tooltip: Paste the visibility range of the label class

customControl.caption: Font
customControl.extendedCaption: Set the font for the current label class
customControl.tooltip: Choose the font and style names for the current label class.

comboBox.caption: Font Size
comboBox.extendedCaption: Set size for current label class
comboBox.tooltip: Choose the font size for the current label class.

button.caption: Grow Font
button.tooltip: Make the labels larger.

button.caption: Shrink Font
button.tooltip: Make the labels smaller.

comboBox.caption: Font Style
comboBox.tooltip: Choose a style for the text symbol

customControl.caption: Set color for current label class
customControl.extendedCaption: Set text symbol color for current label class
customControl.tooltip: Choose the color for the current label class.

tool.caption: Rectangle
tool.tooltip: Select features by clicking them or drawing a box around them.

tool.caption: Polygon
tool.tooltip: Select features by drawing a polygon around them.

tool.caption: Lasso
tool.tooltip: Select features by drawing a freehand shape around them.

tool.caption: Circle
tool.tooltip: Select features by drawing a circle around them.

tool.caption: Line
tool.tooltip: Select features by drawing a line that intersects them.

tool.caption: Trace
tool.tooltip: Select features by tracing a line that touches them.This selection tool is only available in 2D views.

tool.caption: Rectangle
tool.tooltip: Select LAS points by clicking them or drawing a box around them.

tool.caption: Polygon
tool.tooltip: Select LAS points by drawing a polygon around them.

tool.caption: Lasso
tool.tooltip: Select LAS points by drawing a freehand shape around them.

tool.caption: Circle
tool.tooltip: Select LAS points by drawing a circle around them.

tool.caption: Line
tool.tooltip: Select LAS points by drawing a line that intersects them.

tool.caption: Graphical Select
tool.tooltip: Select features using their graphical bounds. Click a point or draw a rectangle.

button.caption: Select Features
button.tooltip: Select features by clicking them or drawing a box around them.

button.caption: Select Features
button.tooltip: Select LAS points by clicking them or drawing a box around them.

button.caption: Clear
button.tooltip: Deselect all currently selected features.

button.caption: Clear
button.tooltip: Deselect all currently selected LAS points.

button.caption: Selection Options
button.tooltip: Set selection options.

button.caption: Topmost Layer
button.tooltip: View pop-up information for features only from the topmost layer.

button.caption: Visible Layers
button.tooltip: View pop-up information for features from all visible layers.

button.caption: Selectable Layers
button.extendedCaption: View pop-up information from selectable layers
button.tooltip: View pop-up information for features from all selectable layers.

button.caption: Selected in Contents
button.tooltip: View pop-up information for features from the layer selected in the Contents pane.

tool.caption: Measure Distance
tool.tooltip: Draw a line to measure the straight-line distance between two or more points.

tool.caption: Measure Area
tool.tooltip: Draw a polygon to measure the area.

tool.caption: Measure Features
tool.tooltip: Click on a feature to measure its length, area and perimeter, or x,y location.

tool.caption: Measure Vertical
tool.tooltip: Draw a vertically constrained line to measure height, depth or elevation change.Only available in 3D.

tool.caption: Measure Terrain Distance
tool.tooltip: Draw a line to measure the distance accross terrain, this line feature will conform to the surface.Only available in 3D.

button.caption: Locate
button.tooltip: Find locations by typing in an address, place name or coordinate values.

button.caption: Candidate Pop-up
button.tooltip: View detailed information by clicking the locator candidate in the map or scene view.

button.caption: What's here?
button.extendedCaption: Find Address or Place from location - Context Menu Item
button.tooltip: Click on a feature or location on the map or scene to see address and coordinate information.

button.caption: Constraints
button.tooltip: Turn dynamic constraints on or off for interactive map tools.

button.caption: Grid
button.tooltip: Turn reference grid on or off for interactive tools.

customControl.caption: Snapping
customControl.extendedCaption: Expand Snapping to show Snap Modes

button.caption: Snapping
button.tooltip: Turn snapping on or off for interactive tools.

button.caption: Point Snapping
button.tooltip: Snap to point features when using interactive map tools.

button.caption: End Snapping
button.tooltip: Snap to the start or end points of lines when using interactive map tools.

button.caption: Vertex Snapping
button.tooltip: Snap to the vertices of lines or polygons when using interactive map tools.

button.caption: Edge Snapping
button.tooltip: Snap to lines or polygons when using interactive map tools.

button.caption: Intersection Snapping
button.tooltip: Snap to the intersection of two or more line or polygons features when using interactive map tools.

button.caption: Midpoint Snapping
button.tooltip: Snap to the midpoint of line or polygon segments when using interactive map tools.

button.caption: Tangent Snapping
button.tooltip: Snap to the point of tangency on curved line or polygon segments when using interactive map tools.

button.caption: Guide Snapping
button.tooltip: Snap to guides when using interactive layout tools.

button.caption: Element Snapping
button.tooltip: Snap to other elements when using interactive layout tools.

button.caption: Snapping Options
button.tooltip: Set additional snapping options.

button.caption: Create
button.extendedCaption: Create thumbnail on the selected item; on ribbon
button.tooltip: Create thumbnail on the selected item.

button.caption: Import
button.extendedCaption: Import thumbnail for the selected item; on ribbon
button.tooltip: Import thumbnail for the selected item.

comboBox.caption: Active Range
comboBox.extendedCaption: Set a range to be interactive.
comboBox.tooltip: Select the range name that you want to interact with using the range slider.

checkBox.caption: Single Value
checkBox.tooltip:
View and interact with the current range using a single-value picker control.
The range span will be set to ‘0’, and the range step size will be set to ‘1’. This mode is well-suited for stepping through a discrete integer range, such as the individual floors of a building or an ordered set of classification codes.

comboBox.caption: Alias Source
comboBox.tooltip: Select the layer that defines the aliases to be displayed on the range slider.

button.caption: Add
button.tooltip: Add an animation for the current map.

button.caption: Remove
button.tooltip: Delete all keyframes and close animation.

button.caption: Movie
button.tooltip: Export the animation using preset or custom settings.

button.caption: Preview
button.tooltip: Preview an exported frame for the current time in the animation.

button.caption: Lock View Size
button.tooltip: Limit the view size to more closely represent the export resolution.

button.caption: Timeline
button.tooltip: Show the Animation Timeline pane to edit keyframes along a timeline.

button.caption: Extruded Path and Keyframes
button.tooltip: Display the animation extruded path and keyframes.

button.caption: Path and Keyframes
button.tooltip: Display the animation path and keyframes.

button.caption: Keyframes
button.tooltip: Display the animation keyframes.

button.caption: Path
button.tooltip: Display the animation path.

button.caption: Append
button.tooltip: Add a keyframe using the selected transition.

button.caption: Sync
button.tooltip: Synchronize edits to your offline features when a network connection is available. Your edits are shared and you receive updates made by other people. Enabled for maps that have been taken offline.

button.caption: Remove
button.tooltip: Your feature edits are shared. The local database of offline features is removed, and the map layers are set to reference the original web feature layers. Map layers referencing the local tile packages are removed and the original map layers become visible again. Local tile packages are not deleted. Enabled for maps that have been taken offline.

button.caption: Fixed
button.tooltip: This path has smooth turns between keyframes.

button.caption: Adjustable
button.tooltip: This path has configurable smooth turns between keyframes.

button.caption: Linear
button.tooltip: This path has straight lines between keyframes.

button.caption: Hop
button.tooltip: This path has configurable bounces between keyframes.

button.caption: Stepped
button.tooltip: This path will immediately cut between keyframes.

button.caption: Interactive Analysis
button.tooltip: Choose and activate the current exploratory analysis tool.

button.caption: Clear All
button.tooltip: Remove all exploratory analysis objects from the current scene.There are no exploratory analysis objects currently in the view.

button.caption: Move to...
button.tooltip: Specify coordinates to move to.

button.caption: Rotate to...
button.tooltip: Specify angles to rotate to.

button.caption: Zoom To
button.tooltip: Move the camera to this view point.

button.caption: Delete
button.tooltip: Delete this item.

button.caption: Line of Sight Properties
button.tooltip: Open the properties for this line of sight.

button.caption: View Dome Properties
button.tooltip: Open the properties for this view dome.

button.caption: Viewshed Properties
button.tooltip: Open the properties for this viewshed.

button.caption: Attach to Camera
button.tooltip: Open the properties for this slice.

button.caption: Slice Properties
button.tooltip: Open the properties for this slice.

button.caption: Slice Properties
button.tooltip: Open the properties for this slice.

button.caption: Slice Properties
button.tooltip: Open the properties for this slice.

button.caption: Slice Properties
button.tooltip: Open the properties for this slice.

button.caption: Move Slice
button.tooltip: Show slice move handles.

button.caption: Rotate Slice
button.tooltip: Show slice rotate handles.

button.caption: Move and Rotate Slice
button.tooltip: Show slice move and rotate handles.

button.caption: Scale Slice
button.tooltip: Show slice scale handles.

button.caption: Accept Slice
button.tooltip: Stop editing and deselect slice.

button.caption: Delete Slice
button.tooltip: Remove the selected slice.

tool.caption: Exploratory Analysis
tool.tooltip: Create interactive analysis graphics.

tool.caption: Exploratory Analysis
tool.tooltip: Create interactive analysis graphics.

tool.caption: Viewshed
tool.tooltip: Create interactive viewshed graphics.

tool.caption: Line of Sight
tool.tooltip: Create interactive line of sight graphics.

tool.caption: Threat Dome
tool.tooltip: Create interactive threat dome graphics.

tool.caption: Slice Rectangle
tool.tooltip: Create interactive slicing rectangles for clipping layers.

tool.caption: Slice Box
tool.tooltip: Create interactive slicing boxes for clipping layers.

tool.caption: Slice Cylinder
tool.tooltip: Create interactive slicing cylinders for clipping layers.

tool.caption: Slice Sphere
tool.tooltip: Create interactive slicing spheres for clipping layers.

button.caption: Remove
button.tooltip: Remove the selected layers from the map. Composite sublayers cannot be individually removed.

button.caption: Zoom To Layer
button.tooltip: Zoom to the extent of the selected layers.

button.caption: Properties
button.tooltip: Show the properties for the selected layers.

button.caption: Properties
button.tooltip: Show the properties for the selected layers.

button.caption: Properties
button.tooltip: Show the properties for the selected annotation sub layers.

button.caption: New Group Layer
button.tooltip: Create a new group layer in the map.

button.caption: New Group Layer
button.tooltip: Create a new group layer in the 2D Layers category.

button.caption: New Group Layer
button.tooltip: Create a new group layer in the 3D Layers category.

button.caption: Add Elevation Surface
button.tooltip: Create a new custom elevation surface.

button.caption: Paste
button.tooltip: Paste the copied elevation surfaces into the map.An elevation surface must be copied.

button.caption: Add Elevation Source
button.tooltip: Add a new elevation source.

button.caption: Remove
button.tooltip: Remove elevation source.

button.caption: Remove
button.tooltip: Remove elevation surface.

button.caption: Properties
button.tooltip: Show the properties for the selected sources.

button.caption: Group
button.tooltip: Create a new group layer containing the selected layers.

button.caption: Ungroup
button.tooltip: Ungroup the layers and add them to the contents list at the same level as the former group layer.

button.caption: Add Data
button.tooltip: Add data to the group layer.

button.caption: Symbology
button.tooltip: Show symbology for the selected layer.

button.caption: Make this the only selectable layer
button.tooltip: Make the selected layer the only selectable layer in the map.

button.caption: Make this the only snappable layer
button.tooltip: Make the selected layer the only snappable layer in the map.

button.caption: Zoom To Make Visible
button.tooltip: Zoom to a scale at which this layer is visible.

button.caption: Bring To Front
button.tooltip: Set layer to highest depth priority.

button.caption: Bring Forward
button.tooltip: Increase depth priority by one.

button.caption: Send To Back
button.tooltip: Set layers depth priority to zero.

button.caption: Send Backward
button.tooltip: Decrease depth priority by one. Zero is the lowest possible depth priority.

button.caption: Depth Priority
button.tooltip: Open depth priority dialog.

button.caption: Zoom To Selection
button.tooltip: Zoom to the selected features in this layer.

button.caption: Pan To Selection
button.tooltip: Pan to the selected features in this layer.

button.caption: Clear Selection
button.tooltip: Deselect the selected features in this layer.Nothing is selected.

button.caption: Switch Selection
button.tooltip: Switch the selection making nonselected features selected.Nothing is selected.

button.caption: Select All
button.tooltip: Select all features in this layer.

button.caption: Select Visible Features
button.extendedCaption: Select features in layer currently in the view
button.tooltip: Select features in this layer that are currently within the view.

button.caption: Select All In Layer
button.tooltip: Select All in Selected Layer

button.caption: Make Layer From Selected Features
button.tooltip:
Make a copy of this layer using just the currently selected features.
Nothing is selected, or this layer type does not support making a new layer from selected features.

button.caption: Layer From Selection
button.tooltip:
Make a copy of this layer using just the currently selected features.
Nothing is selected, or this layer type does not support making a new layer from selected features.

button.caption: Remove
button.tooltip: Remove from the map the selected standalone table.

button.caption: Properties
button.tooltip: Show the properties for the selected table.

button.caption: Remove
button.tooltip: Remove the selected video from the map.

button.caption: Video Metadata
button.tooltip: Show the video metadata pane.

customControl.caption: Out Beyond
customControl.tooltip: Select the maximum zoom level at which the layer is visible. Zoom further from the map than this and the layer will be invisible.

customControl.caption: In Beyond
customControl.tooltip: Select the minimum zoom level at which the layer is visible. Zoom closer to the map than this and the layer will be invisible.

customControl.caption: Download Map
customControl.tooltip:
Take web feature and tile layers offline to complete your work without a network connection. The features and tiles within the visible area of the map will be downloaded. You cannot work with the map while its data is downloading.
You can take a map offline when it has web feature and web tile layers that are configured to support this operation.

button.caption: Clear Limits
button.extendedCaption: Draw layer at all zoom levels
button.tooltip: Draw the layer at all zoom levels.

customControl.caption: Transparency
customControl.tooltip: Set the transparency of the layer.

spinner.caption: Transparency spinner
spinner.tooltip: Set the transparency of the layer.

button.caption: Flicker Button
button.tooltip: Display the layers underneath a particular layer by quickly turning it on and off. This is useful for temporal change detection (especially of satellite images or aerial photographs taken at different times of the same location), data quality comparison, and other analysis where you want to see the difference between layers.Not available yet.

spinner.caption: Flicker Spinner
spinner.tooltip: Flicker time in milliseconds.Not available yet.

button.caption: Symbology
button.tooltip: Show the Symbology pane to symbolize the layer.

button.caption: Symbol Layers
button.tooltip: Enable symbol layer drawing for a feature layer.

customControl.caption: Masking
customControl.tooltip: Choose layers to mask the selected layer.

button.caption: Display Filters
button.tooltip: Show the display filters pane.Display Filters are not available for layers in a scene.

comboBox.caption: Layer Definition Query
comboBox.extendedCaption: Set definition query for layer or table
comboBox.tooltip: Define a query expression to display only a subset of features in the layer or table.

button.caption: Build Definition Query
button.tooltip: Enter a definition query expression to display only a subset of features in the layer or table.

button.caption: Annotate Selected Features
button.tooltip:
Create annotation for selected features.
Nothing is selected, or this layer type does not support creating annotation for selected features, or there are no annotation layers in the map.

button.caption: Labels to Annotation
button.tooltip: Convert labels to annotation.Not available yet.

button.caption: Copy Records
button.tooltip: Copy selected feature records to clipboard.Not available yet.
Show layer's Streaming Data Properties.

button.caption: Label
button.tooltip: Enable labeling of the on the layer.Service does not support labeling.

button.caption: Select All
button.tooltip: Select all features in this layer.The layer does not have a buddy feature service.

button.caption: Change Version
button.extendedCaption: Change the version for the selected datasource.
button.tooltip: Change the data source version.The selected data source must be an enterprise geodatabase and all map members must be connected.

button.caption: Change Moment
button.extendedCaption: Change the time moment for the selected datasource.
button.tooltip: Change the data source time moment.The selected data source must be an enterprise geodatabase and all map members must be connected.

button.caption: Version Manager
button.extendedCaption: Open the version management view for the selected datasource.
button.tooltip: Manage the data source versions.The selected data source must be an enterprise geodatabase.

button.caption: New Version
button.extendedCaption: Creates a new version off the currently selected datasource version with the option to then change to the new version.
button.tooltip: Create a new version.The current project contains unsaved feature edits.

button.caption: Historical Moments
button.extendedCaption: Open the historical viewer for the selected datasource.
button.tooltip: View the datasource at different points in time.The selected data source must be an enterprise geodatabase.

button.caption: New Bookmark...
button.tooltip: Bookmarks are stored with the map or scene that captured them and can be used with any open view.

button.caption: Manage Bookmarks
button.tooltip: Manage bookmarks from a dockable window. You can update, zoom to, remove and rename bookmarks. The bookmark list can be displayed with an optional thumbnail.

button.caption: Show Descriptions
button.tooltip: Toggles the display of bookmark descriptions.

dynamicMenu.caption: Update
dynamicMenu.tooltip: Make the current location of the view the new extent for the bookmark.

customControl.caption: Brightness
customControl.tooltip: Adjust the displayed brightness characteristics of the selected raster layer.

customControl.caption: Contrast
customControl.tooltip: Adjust the displayed contrast characteristics of the selected raster layer.

customControl.caption: Gamma
customControl.tooltip: Adjust the gamma transformation applied to the selected raster layer.

customControl.caption: Compression
customControl.tooltip: Adjust the compression of the selected layer.

customControl.caption: DRA
customControl.tooltip: Adjust the stretch using only the data contained within the view.Symbology must be RGB or Stretch.

button.caption: Background
button.tooltip: Set a pixel value to display as background.

button.caption: Zoom To Source Resolution
button.tooltip: Display the selected image at its optimal resolution within the display.

button.caption: North Up
button.tooltip: Rotate the map so the top of the display is always oriented toward north.The selected dataset is already north-oriented. The operation is not supported in Image Space mode.

button.caption: Top Up
button.tooltip: Rotate the map so the top of the display is always oriented to the direction of the sensor when it acquired the image.The selected dataset lacks proper metadata for rotation. The operation is not supported in Image Space mode.

button.caption: Add To Map
button.extendedCaption: Add selected rasters as new group layer
button.tooltip: Add the selected rasters as a new group layer.Nothing is selected.

button.caption: Visible
button.tooltip: Select all features within the current view extent and scale.

button.caption: Lock To Selection
button.tooltip: Display only the selected rasters.Nothing is selected.

button.caption: Deselect overviews
button.tooltip: Remove overviews from selection.Nothing is selected.

button.caption: All
button.tooltip: Select all features in this layer.

button.caption: Clear
button.tooltip: Deselect the selected features in this layer.Nothing is selected.

tool.caption: Rotate
tool.tooltip: Rotate the map.

tool.caption: Flicker
tool.tooltip: Display the layers underneath a particular layer by quickly turning it on and off. This is useful for temporal change detection (especially of satellite images or aerial photographs taken at different times of the same location), data quality comparison, and other analysis where you want to see the difference between layers.Not available yet.

button.caption: Custom
button.tooltip: Choose the band combination to use to display your multiple band raster layer.

tool.caption: Swipe
tool.tooltip:
Click and drag to reveal content hidden behind the selected layer.
In 2D, swipe across any layer, including features and imagery layers.
In 3D, swipe across imagery layers and 3D feature layers, such as extruded shapes, buildings, and 3D markers.

tool.caption: Swipe
tool.tooltip: Click and drag to reveal content hidden behind the selected elevation surface.

comboBox.caption: Renderer:
comboBox.tooltip: Choose the stretch type to use to enhance the raster layer.

button.caption: New Mosaic
button.tooltip: Create a new mosaic dataset.

button.caption: Symbology
button.tooltip: Show symbology for the selected layer.

button.caption: Stretch Type
button.tooltip: Open the histogram page.
Open the mosaicking properties page.
Open the processing templates properties page.

button.caption: Add custom...
button.tooltip: Add a custom raster processing template.Not supported.

button.caption: Use Service Cache
button.tooltip: A cached image service can be accessed as cache for quick display or this can be disabled to provide access to all dynamic capabilities of the image service. The source image service is not cached.

button.caption: Variables
button.tooltip: Filter by variables.Not a multidimensional layer.

button.caption: Range
button.tooltip: Open the range definition properties page.

button.caption: Fields
button.extendedCaption: Open fields view for the selected layer.
button.tooltip: Open a view of the fields in the layer.

button.caption: Subtypes
button.extendedCaption: Open subtypes view for the selected layer.
button.tooltip: Open a view of the subtypes in the layer.

button.caption: Domains
button.extendedCaption: Open domains view for the selected layer.
button.tooltip: Open a view of the domains in the layer.

button.caption: Copy
button.extendedCaption: Copy the selected field to the clipboard.
button.tooltip: Copy the selected fields to the clipboard.

button.caption: Paste
button.tooltip: Paste the selected fields from the clipboard.

button.caption: Cut
button.extendedCaption: Cut the selected field to the clipboard.
button.tooltip: Cut the selected fields to the clipboard.

button.caption: Delete
button.tooltip: Delete the selected fields.

button.caption: Domains
button.extendedCaption: Open domains view from the current fields view.
button.tooltip: Open a view of the domains in the layer or table.

button.caption: Subtypes
button.extendedCaption: Open subtypes view from the current fields view.
button.tooltip: Open a view of the subtypes in the layer or table.

button.caption: New Field
button.extendedCaption: Create a new field in the current table or class.
button.tooltip: Create a new field.

button.caption: Save
button.extendedCaption: Save edits to the current fields view.
button.tooltip: Save the modifications to the table.Save is enabled when there are valid edits to the fields, but disabled if the current project contains unsaved feature edits.

editBox.caption: Filter Name:
editBox.extendedCaption: Filters the fields displayed by name or alias to match the filter text.

editBox.caption: Filter Domain:
editBox.extendedCaption: Filters the fields displayed by domain name to match the filter text.

button.caption: Copy
button.extendedCaption: Copy the selected subtype domain or default value to the clipboard.
button.tooltip: Copy the selected subtypes to the clipboard.

button.caption: Paste
button.extendedCaption: Paste the copied subtype domain or default value from the clipboard.
button.tooltip: Paste the selected subtypes from the clipboard.

button.caption: Cut
button.extendedCaption: Cut the selected subtype domain or default value to the clipboard.
button.tooltip: Cut the selected subtypes to the clipboard.

button.caption: Delete
button.extendedCaption: Delete the selected subtype domain or default value.
button.tooltip: Delete the selected subtypes.

button.caption: Undo
button.extendedCaption: Undo the most recent subtype edit.
button.tooltip: Undo clipboard operation.Not available yet.

button.caption: Redo
button.extendedCaption: Redo the most recently undone subtype edit.
button.tooltip: Redo clipboard operation.Not available yet.

button.caption: Create/Manage
button.tooltip: Open a dialog to create and manage subtypes in the layer or table.You must have a subtype field selected to use subtypes.

button.caption: Domains
button.extendedCaption: Open domains view from the current subtypes view.
button.tooltip: Open a view of the domains in the layer or table.

button.caption: Fields
button.extendedCaption: Open fields view from the current subtypes view.
button.tooltip: Open a view of the fields in the layer or table.

button.caption: Save
button.extendedCaption: Save edits to the current subtypes view.
button.tooltip: Save the modifications to the table.Save is enabled when there are valid edits to the subtypes, but disabled if the current project contains unsaved feature edits.

button.caption: Copy
button.extendedCaption: Copy the selected domain to the clipboard.
button.tooltip: Copy the selected domains to the clipboard.

button.caption: Paste
button.extendedCaption: Paste the copied domain from the clipboard.
button.tooltip: Paste the selected domains from the clipboard.

button.caption: Cut
button.extendedCaption: Cut the selected domain to the clipboard.
button.tooltip: Cut the selected domains to the clipboard.

button.caption: Delete
button.extendedCaption: Deletes the selected domain or selected coded value(s).
button.tooltip: Deletes the selected domain or selected coded value(s).

button.caption: New Domain
button.extendedCaption: Creates a new domain in the current domains view.
button.tooltip: Create a new domain.

button.caption: Save
button.extendedCaption: Save edits to the current domains view.
button.tooltip: Save the modifications to the workspace.Save is enabled when there are valid edits to the domains, but disabled if the current project contains unsaved feature edits.

editBox.caption: Filter Text:
editBox.extendedCaption: Filters the current domains view to match the filter box text.

editBox.caption: Name:
editBox.extendedCaption: Filters versions in the current view to show names matching the search text.

comboBox.caption: Owner:
comboBox.extendedCaption: Filters the versions in the current view to match those with the selected owner.

button.caption: New Version
button.extendedCaption: Creates a new version in the current versions view.
button.tooltip: Adds a new version as a child of the selected version.

button.caption: Delete
button.tooltip: Delete selected row/version.

button.caption: Refresh Versions
button.extendedCaption: Refreshes the list of versions from the source in the current versions view.
button.tooltip: Refresh the versions in this view from the source.

button.caption: Change to Selected Version
button.extendedCaption: Changes the version that the current datasource to the selected version.
button.tooltip: Set the map to the selected version of the data.

button.caption: Reconcile/Post
button.extendedCaption: Reconcile the selected versions from the current version view.
button.tooltip: Reconcile and optionally post the selected version.

button.caption: Save
button.extendedCaption: Save edits in the current versions view.
button.tooltip: Apply changes to this version.Save is enabled when there are valid edits to the versions and there are no unsaved feature edits in the project.

button.caption: Add Archive
button.extendedCaption: Add archive table for the selected map member.
button.tooltip: Add archive table for the selected map member.The selected dataset does not have an archive table.

button.caption: Configure Pop-ups
button.tooltip: Show the Pop-ups pane to configure the content of the selected layer.

button.caption: Enable Pop-ups
button.tooltip: Enable the configuration of pop-up content for this layer.

button.caption: Disable Pop-ups
button.tooltip: Remove the pop-up configuration for this layer.

button.caption: Set Pop-up Source
button.extendedCaption: Set feature layer as layer's popup source
button.tooltip: Set a feature layer to use for this layer's popups.

button.caption: Remove Pop-up Source
button.extendedCaption: Remove feature layer as layer's popup source
button.tooltip: Stop using feature layer for this layer's popups.

button.caption: Zoom To
button.tooltip: Zoom in and center the map on the selected candidate.

button.caption: Pan To
button.tooltip: Pan the map to center on the selected candidate.

button.caption: Add To Selection
button.tooltip: Add candidate to selected features.

button.caption: All
button.tooltip: Select all rows.

button.caption: Switch
button.tooltip: Switch selected rows.

button.caption: Clear
button.tooltip: Deselect all the currently selected rows.

button.caption: Hide Selection
button.tooltip: Hide seleced features.

button.caption: Show Hidden
button.tooltip: Show hidden features.

button.caption: Cache Features
button.tooltip: Cache Features.

button.caption: Clear Feature Cache
button.tooltip: Clear feature cache.

tool.caption: Infographics
tool.tooltip:
Use Esri's geoenrichment service to view infographics for an area of interest by clicking on a polygon or for a buffered distance, driving distance or drive time when you click a point.
This tool consumes credits.You need to sign-in through ArcGIS.com with a credited account to use this tool.

button.caption: Configure Infographics
button.tooltip: Choose from popular data collections and categorized variables to display when using the Infographics tool.You need to sign-in through ArcGIS.com with a credited account to use this tool.

button.caption: Go to camera position
button.extendedCaption: Reposition the point of view to the node’s snapshot.
button.tooltip:
Reposition the point of view to the node’s snapshot.
You must select a single KML node in a 3D view.

button.caption: Zoom to node
button.extendedCaption: Zooms to the selected KML nodes in the TOC.
button.tooltip: Zooms to the selected KML nodes in the TOC.

button.caption: Pan to node
button.extendedCaption: Pans to the selected KML nodes in the TOC.
button.tooltip: Pans to the selected KML nodes in the TOC.

button.caption: Flash placemark
button.extendedCaption: Flashes the selected KML placemarks in the TOC.
button.tooltip:
Flashes the selected KML placemarks in the TOC.
You must select some placemarks.

button.caption: Show Pop-up
button.extendedCaption: Shows the pop-up for this KML node.
button.tooltip: View pop-up information for this KML node.

button.caption: Label
button.tooltip: Enable labeling of the placemarks in the KML layer.

button.caption: Refresh
button.tooltip: Refreshes the selected KML layer in the TOC.

button.caption: Geocode Table
button.tooltip: Batch geocode selected table.

button.caption: Use Wizard
button.tooltip: Batch geocode current table.

button.caption: Start Stream
button.tooltip: Clears and starts the stream, when it is stopped.

button.caption: Stop Stream
button.tooltip: Stops the stream and captures a snapshot of the observations.

button.caption: Discard Observations
button.tooltip: Clears all observations but does not stop the stream.

button.caption: Sync
button.tooltip: Synchronize this geodatabase.

gallery.caption: Filter
gallery.tooltip: Filter

gallery.caption: Basemap
gallery.tooltip: Choose a basemap for your map. The basemap is the reference data that displays under the notes and other GIS data you have added to the map.

gallery.caption: Basemap
gallery.tooltip: Choose a basemap for your preview. The basemap is the reference data that displays under the notes and other GIS data you have added to the map.

gallery.caption: Bookmarks
gallery.tooltip: Zoom to, create, or manage bookmarks for maps within your project.

gallery.caption: Stretch Type
gallery.tooltip: Choose a stretch type for the raster layer.Symbology must be RGB or Stretch.

gallery.caption: Resampling Type
gallery.tooltip: Choose a resampling type for the raster layer.

gallery.caption: Band Combination
gallery.tooltip: Choose a band combination to display the raster layer.Select a multi-band dataset.

gallery.caption: Symbology
gallery.extendedCaption: Open WMS sub layer symbology gallery

gallery.caption: Label Placement Style
gallery.tooltip: Choose the label placment style for the current label class.

gallery.caption: Template
gallery.tooltip: Choose product template.

gallery.caption: Sort
gallery.tooltip: Define rules to display overlapping imagery using a mosaic method.

gallery.caption: Resolve Overlap
gallery.tooltip: Define rules to display overlapping pixels using a mosaic operator.

gallery.caption: Processing Templates
gallery.tooltip: Choose a predefined processing template to apply on the layer.

gallery.caption: Face Culling
gallery.tooltip: Prevent features from being drawn based on the direction they face relative to your current view position, providing the effect of being able to see through objects. Requires area-based data, including extruded polygons, multipatches, TIN triangles, and rasters.

gallery.caption: Lighting
gallery.tooltip: Defines the lighting of each face of a multipatch.

gallery.caption: Type
gallery.tooltip: Set the extrusion expression to provide an absolute extrusion height for all features.

gallery.caption: Add Preset
gallery.tooltip: Add a preset layer.

gallery.caption: Related Data
gallery.tooltip: Select from the list of relationships to view data related to the layer or table's selection.Enabled when the active layer or table has relationships and selected features or records.

gallery.caption: Import
gallery.tooltip: Import items into existing animation.

gallery.caption: Add Overlay
gallery.tooltip: Add a graphic to be displayed in the animation.

gallery.caption: Drawing Mode
gallery.tooltip: Draw the scene using perspective or isometric.Available in scene views only.

gallery.caption: Filter
gallery.tooltip: Filter

menu.caption: Add To New
menu.tooltip: Add data to a new map or scene.

menu.caption: Add
menu.tooltip: Add a system style or a custom style to the project.

menu.caption: New
menu.tooltip: Create a new, empty custom style or mobile style, and add it to the project.

menu.caption: View
menu.extendedCaption: Open style context menu in project view

menu.caption: View
menu.extendedCaption: Open style context menu in project pane

menu.caption: View
menu.extendedCaption: Open file styleX context menu in project view

menu.extendedCaption: Open file styleX context menu in project pane

menu.caption: View
menu.extendedCaption: Open stereo map content context menu

menu.caption: More
menu.tooltip: Review and set various options for labeling.

menu.caption: Labeling
menu.tooltip: Review and set various options for labeling.
